New_Haven.First Congregational Church of East Have: The First Congregational Church of East Haven (also known as Old Stone Church) is a historic church at 251 Main Street in East Haven, Connecticut. It is a red sandstone structure, 2-1/2 stories in height, set on a large grassy lot overlooking the town center. It was built in 1772-74 by George Lancraft, a local builder, and is one of Connecticut's few surviving pre-Revolutionary churches.
